trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 편집을 지원 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new sibling node after the currently selected node using the XML string specified.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 XML 문자열을 사용 하 여 현재 선택 된 노드 뒤에 새로운 형제 노드를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: To create a new element node, include all XML syntax in the XML string parameter.
trans-unit.target: 새 요소 노드를 만들려면 XML 문자열 매개 변수에서 모든 XML 구문을 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The string for a new `book` node is `InsertAfter("<book/>")`.
trans-unit.target: 새 항목에 대 한 문자열 `book` 노드는 `InsertAfter("<book/>")`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The string for inserting the text "book" after the current node's text node is `InsertAfter("book")`.
trans-unit.target: 현재 노드의 텍스트 노드는 후 "book" 텍스트를 삽입 하기 위한 문자열 `InsertAfter("book")`합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the XML string contains multiple nodes, all nodes are added.
trans-unit.target: XML 문자열에 여러 개의 노드가 포함 된 경우 모든 노드가 추가 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the InsertAfter method.
trans-unit.target: 다음은 InsertAfter 메서드를 사용 하는 경우를 고려해 야 할 중요 한 참고 사항입니다.

trans-unit.source: - The InsertAfter method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.
trans-unit.target: -InsertAfter 메서드는 경우에만 유효는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>에서 요소, 텍스트, 처리 명령 또는 주석 노드에 배치 됩니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The InsertAfter method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: InsertAfter 메서드- <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 의 위치에는 영향을 주지

trans-unit.source: The XML data string for the new sibling node.
trans-unit.target: 새 형제 노드에 대 한 XML 데이터 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: The XML string parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: XML 문자열 매개 변수는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not allow a new sibling node to be inserted after the current node.
trans-unit.target: 위치는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 현재 노드 뒤에 삽입할 새 형제 노드를 허용 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 편집을 지원 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The XML string parameter is not well-formed.
trans-unit.target: XML 문자열 매개 변수가 올바르지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new sibling node after the currently selected node using the XML contents of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object specified.
trans-unit.target: XML 콘텐츠를 사용 하 여 현재 선택 된 노드 뒤에 새로운 형제 노드를 만듭니다는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>지정 된 개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the InsertAfter method.
trans-unit.target: 다음은 InsertAfter 메서드를 사용 하는 경우를 고려해 야 할 중요 한 참고 사항입니다.

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object is positioned over a sequence of XML nodes, all the nodes in the sequence are added.
trans-unit.target: If는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>개체가 XML 노드 시퀀스에 대해 위치, 시퀀스에 있는 모든 노드가 추가 됩니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: - The InsertAfter method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.
trans-unit.target: -InsertAfter 메서드는 경우에만 유효는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>에서 요소, 텍스트, 처리 명령 또는 주석 노드에 배치 됩니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The InsertAfter method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: InsertAfter 메서드- <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 의 위치에는 영향을 주지

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object positioned on the XML data for the new sibling node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>새 형제 노드에 대 한 XML 데이터에.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object is in an error state or closed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>개체가 오류 상태 이거나 닫혀 있습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>개체 매개 변수는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not allow a new sibling node to be inserted after the current node.
trans-unit.target: 위치는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 현재 노드 뒤에 삽입할 새 형제 노드를 허용 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 편집을 지원 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The XML contents of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object parameter is not well-formed.
trans-unit.target: XML 콘텐츠는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>개체 매개 변수가 올바른 형식이 아닙니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new sibling node after the currently selected node using the nodes in the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object specified.
trans-unit.target: 노드를 사용 하 여 현재 선택 된 노드 뒤에 새로운 형제 노드를 만듭니다는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 지정 된 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the InsertAfter method.
trans-unit.target: 다음은 InsertAfter 메서드를 사용 하는 경우를 고려해 야 할 중요 한 참고 사항입니다.

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object is positioned over a sequence of XML nodes, all the nodes in the sequence are added.
trans-unit.target: If는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>개체가 XML 노드 시퀀스에 대해 위치, 시퀀스에 있는 모든 노드가 추가 됩니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: - The InsertAfter method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.
trans-unit.target: -InsertAfter 메서드는 경우에만 유효는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>에서 요소, 텍스트, 처리 명령 또는 주석 노드에 배치 됩니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The InsertAfter method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: InsertAfter 메서드- <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 의 위치에는 영향을 주지

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object positioned on the node to add as the new sibling node.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 새 형제 노드로 추가할 노드에 배치 되는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not allow a new sibling node to be inserted after the current node.
trans-unit.target: 위치는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 현재 노드 뒤에 삽입할 새 형제 노드를 허용 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object used to create a new sibling node before the currently selected node.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>개체를 현재 선택 된 노드 앞에 새 형제 노드를 만드는 데 사용 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the InsertBefore method.
trans-unit.target: InsertBefore 메서드를 사용 하는 경우를 고려해 야 할 중요 한 참고 사항은 다음과 같습니다.

trans-unit.source: - The new sibling node is not inserted until the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object is called.
trans-unit.target: -새 형제 노드에 삽입 될 때까지 되지 않고는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A>의 메서드는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>개체를 호출 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> </xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The InsertBefore method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.

trans-unit.source: - The InsertBefore method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object used to create a new sibling node before the currently selected node.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new sibling node before the currently selected node using the XML string specified.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 XML 문자열을 사용 하 여 현재 선택 된 노드 앞에 새 형제 노드를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: To create a new element node, include all XML syntax in the XML string parameter.
trans-unit.target: 새 요소 노드를 만들려면 XML 문자열 매개 변수에서 모든 XML 구문을 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The string for a new `book` node is `InsertBefore("<book/>")`.
trans-unit.target: 새 항목에 대 한 문자열 `book` 노드는 `InsertBefore("<book/>")`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The string for inserting the text "book" before the current node's text node is `InsertBefore("book")`.
trans-unit.target: 현재 노드의 텍스트 크기를 "책" 텍스트를 삽입 하기 위한 문자열 `InsertBefore("book")`합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the XML string contains multiple nodes, all nodes are added.
trans-unit.target: XML 문자열에 여러 개의 노드가 포함 된 경우 모든 노드가 추가 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object positioned on the node to add as the new sibling node.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 편집을 지원 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new sibling element after the current node using the namespace prefix, local name and namespace URI specified, with the value specified.
trans-unit.target: 네임 스페이스 접두사, 로컬 이름 및 네임 스페이스 지정 된 값이 지정 된 URI 사용 하 여 현재 노드 뒤에 새 형제 요소를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: Namespace prefix and URI values can be obtained using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Namespace 접두사 및 URI 값 얻을 수 있습니다를 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A>또는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the following syntax inserts a sibling element by using the in-scope namespace `xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`: ``` navigator.InsertElementAfter(navigator.Prefix, "pages", LookupNamespaceURI(navigator.Prefix), String.Empty) ``` This creates the new sibling `<bk:pages/>` element.
trans-unit.target: 다음 구문을 범위 내의 네임 스페이스를 사용 하 여 형제 요소를 삽입 하는 예를 들어 `xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`: ``` navigator.InsertElementAfter(navigator.Prefix, "pages", LookupNamespaceURI(navigator.Prefix), String.Empty) ``` 새 형제 노드를 만들고이 `<bk:pages/>` 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the InsertElementAfter method.
trans-unit.target: 다음은 InsertElementAfter 메서드를 사용할 때 고려해 야 할 중요 한 참고 사항입니다.

trans-unit.source: - If the namespace prefix specified is `null` or <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, then the prefix for the namespace URI of the new element is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope.
trans-unit.target: -지정 된 네임 스페이스 접두사는 경우 `null` 또는 <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, 다음 현재 네임 스페이스 범위 내에서 새 요소의 URI 네임 스페이스의 접두사를 가져옵니다.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, then a namespace prefix is automatically generated.
trans-unit.target: URI 현재 범위에서 지정된 된 네임 스페이스에 할당 된 네임 스페이스 접두사가 없으면 네임 스페이스 접두사를 자동으로 생성 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: - The InsertElementAfter method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.
trans-unit.target: -InsertElementAfter 메서드는 경우에만 유효는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>에서 요소, 텍스트, 처리 명령 또는 주석 노드에 배치 됩니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The InsertElementAfter method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -InsertElementAfter 메서드 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 의 위치에 영향을 주지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The namespace prefix of the new child element (if any).
trans-unit.target: 새 자식 요소 (있는 경우)의 네임 스페이스 접두사입니다.

trans-unit.source: The local name of the new child element (if any).
trans-unit.target: 새 자식 요소 (있는 경우)의 로컬 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the new child element (if any).
trans-unit.target: 네임 스페이스 URI 새 자식 요소 (있는 경우).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>및 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 동일 합니다.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The value of the new child element.
trans-unit.target: 새 자식 요소의 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.String> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> are passed, an empty element is created.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.String>또는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 을 전달 하면 빈 요소가 생성 됩니다.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not allow a new sibling node to be inserted after the current node.
trans-unit.target: 위치는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 현재 노드 뒤에 삽입할 새 형제 노드를 허용 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 편집을 지원 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new sibling element before the current node using the namespace prefix, local name, and namespace URI specified, with the value specified.
trans-unit.target: 네임 스페이스 접두사, 로컬 이름 및 네임 스페이스 지정 된 값이 지정 된 URI 사용 하 여 현재 노드 앞에 새 형제 요소를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: Namespace prefix and URI values can be obtained using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Namespace 접두사 및 URI 값 얻을 수 있습니다를 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A>또는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the following syntax inserts a sibling element by using the in-scope namespace `xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`: ``` navigator.InsertElementBefore(navigator.Prefix, "pages", LookupNamespaceURI(navigator.Prefix), String.Empty) ``` This creates the new sibling `<bk:pages/>` element.
trans-unit.target: 다음 구문을 범위 내의 네임 스페이스를 사용 하 여 형제 요소를 삽입 하는 예를 들어 `xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`: ``` navigator.InsertElementBefore(navigator.Prefix, "pages", LookupNamespaceURI(navigator.Prefix), String.Empty) ``` 새 형제 노드를 만들고이 `<bk:pages/>` 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the InsertElementBefore method.
trans-unit.target: 다음은 InsertElementBefore 메서드를 사용할 때 고려해 야 할 중요 한 참고 사항입니다.

trans-unit.source: - If the namespace prefix specified is `null` or <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, then the prefix for the namespace URI of the new element is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope.
trans-unit.target: -지정 된 네임 스페이스 접두사는 경우 `null` 또는 <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, 다음 현재 네임 스페이스 범위 내에서 새 요소의 URI 네임 스페이스의 접두사를 가져옵니다.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, then a namespace prefix is automatically generated.
trans-unit.target: URI 현재 범위에서 지정된 된 네임 스페이스에 할당 된 네임 스페이스 접두사가 없으면 네임 스페이스 접두사를 자동으로 생성 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: - The InsertElementBefore method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.
trans-unit.target: -InsertElementBefore 메서드는 경우에만 유효는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>에서 요소, 텍스트, 처리 명령 또는 주석 노드에 배치 됩니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The InsertElementBefore method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -InsertElementBefore 메서드 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 의 위치에 영향을 주지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The namespace prefix of the new child element (if any).
trans-unit.target: 새 자식 요소 (있는 경우)의 네임 스페이스 접두사입니다.

trans-unit.source: The local name of the new child element (if any).
trans-unit.target: 새 자식 요소 (있는 경우)의 로컬 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the new child element (if any).
trans-unit.target: 네임 스페이스 URI 새 자식 요소 (있는 경우).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>및 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 동일 합니다.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The value of the new child element.
trans-unit.target: 새 자식 요소의 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.String> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> are passed, an empty element is created.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.String>또는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 을 전달 하면 빈 요소가 생성 됩니다.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not allow a new sibling node to be inserted before the current node.
trans-unit.target: 위치는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 현재 노드 앞에 삽입할 새 형제 노드를 허용 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 편집을 지원 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is a descendant of the current <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 확인 여부를 지정 된 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 현재 노드의 하위 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is a descendant of the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> if it is positioned on a descendant node of the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>현재 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 하위 노드에 배치 하는 경우</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 현재 노드의 하위</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Take, for example, the following XML string: `<item><name>widget</name></item>` If the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the `item` node, and the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified is positioned on the `name` node, IsDescendant returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 다음 XML 문자열에 수행: `<item><name>widget</name></item>` 경우 현재 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>에 배치 되는 `item` 노드를 및 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>지정에 배치 되는 `name` 노드를 IsDescendant 반환 `true`.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: This method always returns `false` under the following conditions: - The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified shares the same implementation but points at a different document instance than the current navigator.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 항상 반환 `false` 다음과 같은 경우:- <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>지정 된 공유를 구현 하지만 다른 문서에 지점을 동일한 인스턴스를 현재 탐색기.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified has a different implementation than the current navigator.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>지정 된 현재 탐색기와 다르게 구현 했습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to compare to this <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 이 비교할 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is a descendant of the current <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>하는 경우 지정 된 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 현재 노드의 하위 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the current node is an empty element without an end element tag.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면 현재 노드가 끝 요소 태그가 없는 빈 요소 인지를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to determine the difference between the following different elements.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 사용 하면 다음과 같은 다양 한 요소 간의 차이 확인할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: |Element|IsEmptyElement Value| |-------------|--------------------------| |`<item num="123"/>`|`true`| |`<item num="123">test</item>`|`false`| |`<item num="123"></item>`|`false`|
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current node is an empty element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>현재 노드가 빈 요소 인지 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating if the current node represents an XPath node.
trans-unit.target: 현재 노드가 XPath 노드를 나타내는지를 표시 하는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 항상 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, determines whether the current <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is at the same position as the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면 확인 여부를 현재 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 는 지정 된 동일한 위치에 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The IsSamePosition method assumes that the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified shares the same implementation and is points at the same document instance as the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: IsSamePosition 메서드를 가정 하는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>지정 동일 하 게 구현을 공유 하 고 현재 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 와 동일한 문서 인스턴스에 포인트인</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: This method always returns `false` under the following conditions: - The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified shares the same implementation but points at a different document instance than the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 항상 반환 `false` 다음과 같은 경우:- <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>동일한 구현 하지만 현재 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 보다 다른 문서 인스턴스를 가리키는 공유 지정</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> has a different implementation than the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>현재 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 보다는 서로 다른 구현이</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to compare to this <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 이 비교할 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> objects have the same position; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>하는 경우 두 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 개체 동일한 위치에는, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name*> of the current node without any namespace prefix.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name*>현재 노드의 네임 스페이스 접두사 없이.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The local name returned depends on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 로컬 이름에 따라 달라 집니다는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>현재 노드의.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: For example, the local name for the `<bk:book>` element is `book`.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 로컬 이름을 `<bk:book>` 요소는 `book`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the value returned by the LocalName property, based on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 기반으로 LocalName 속성에서 반환 된 값이 표시 되는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>현재 노드의.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: |XPathNodeType|Property Value| |-------------------|--------------------| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The local name of the element.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The local name of the attribute.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The prefix associated with the namespace URI.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The target of the processing instruction.| |All other <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nodes|<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.|
trans-unit.target: | XPathNodeType | 속성 값 | |-------------------|--------------------| | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| 요소의 로컬 이름입니다. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| 특성의 로컬 이름입니다. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| 네임 스페이스 URI와 관련 된. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| 처리 명령의 대상입니다. | | 다른 모든 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>노드 |<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>. |</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the local name of the current node, or <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> if the current node does not have a name (for example, text or comment nodes).
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>현재 노드의 로컬 이름을 포함 하는 또는 <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> 이름 (예: 텍스트 또는 주석 노드) 하는 경우 현재 노드가 없습니다.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the namespace URI for the specified prefix.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 접두사에 대 한 네임 스페이스를 URI를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> is specified as the `prefix` parameter, the currently assigned default namespace URI is returned.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>로 지정 된는 `prefix` 매개 변수를 현재 할당 된 기본 네임 스페이스 URI가 반환 됩니다.</xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If no default namespace URI is explicitly assigned, and <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is specified as the `prefix` parameter, the blank prefix is associated with elements that are not in any namespace, and <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 기본 네임 스페이스 URI이 명시적으로 할당 하는 경우 및 <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>로 지정 된는 `prefix` 매개 변수는 빈 접두사는 모든 네임 스페이스에 없는 요소와 연결 하 고 <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>반환 됩니다.</xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The prefix to namespace URI mappings can change from node to node in an XML document.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > URI 매핑에 네임 스페이스 접두사는 XML 문서에서 노드 간에 변경할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: As a result, the value of the LookupNamespace method may not be consistent from one node to the next.
trans-unit.target: 결과적으로, LookupNamespace 메서드의 값 마다 한 노드에서 일관 된 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The prefix whose namespace URI you want to resolve.
trans-unit.target: 해결 하려는 네임 스페이스 URI 접두사입니다.

trans-unit.source: To match the default namespace, pass <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 기본 네임 스페이스를 일치 시키려면 전달 <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the namespace URI assigned to the namespace prefix specified; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no namespace URI is assigned to the prefix specified.
trans-unit.target: 네임 스페이스에 할당 된 URI 네임 스페이스를 포함 하는 <xref:System.String>; 지정 된 접두사 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 네임 스페이스 URI에 지정 된 접두사에 할당 된 경우.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> returned is atomized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>반환은 원자화.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the prefix declared for the specified namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 네임 스페이스 URI에 대해 선언 된 접두사를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The LookupPrefix method returns the first prefix that matches the namespace URI specified.
trans-unit.target: LookupPrefix 메서드 네임 스페이스 URI와 일치 하는 첫 번째 접두사를 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Multiple prefixes referring to the same namespace URI are not ordered in any particular way, so a particular prefix may not be returned each time when more than one is assigned.
trans-unit.target: 동일한 네임 스페이스를 참조 하는 여러 개의 접두사 URI에에서 정렬 되어 있지 특정 방식으로, 특정 접두사 될 때마다 하나 이상 할당 된 경우 반환 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Namespace URI to prefix mappings can change from node to node in an XML document.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 간 접두사 매핑이 Namespace URI는 XML 문서에서 노드 간에 변경할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: As a result, the value of the LookupPrefix method may not be consistent from one node to the next.
trans-unit.target: 결과적으로, LookupPrefix 메서드의 값 마다 한 노드에서 일관 된 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI to resolve for the prefix.
trans-unit.target: 네임 스페이스 접두사에 대해 확인할 URI입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the namespace prefix assigned to the namespace URI specified; otherwise, <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> if no prefix is assigned to the namespace URI specified.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>; 지정 된 URI 네임 스페이스에 할당 된 네임 스페이스 접두사를 포함 하 고, 그러지 <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> 접두사가 없으면 네임 스페이스 URI에 지정 되 면.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current node matches the specified XPath expression.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current node matches the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 현재 노드가 지정 된 일치 하는지를 확인 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect on the state of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.

trans-unit.source: This method is identical to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Matches%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, except that a <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> object containing the compiled XPath expression is specified, rather than an XPath expression <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Matches%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드와 비슷하지만 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>대신 XPath 식을 <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> 컴파일된 XPath 식이 포함 된 개체를 지정</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Matches%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref> object containing the compiled XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"> </xref> 컴파일된 XPath 식을 포함 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current node matches the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>현재 노드가 일치 하는 경우는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"> </xref>, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression cannot be evaluated.

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression is not valid.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the same position as the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 된 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 지정 된 같은 위치에 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method always returns `true` if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified is an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> that shares the same implementation and points at the same document instance as the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 항상 반환 `true` 경우 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>동일한 구현과 지점 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 현재 같은 문서 인스턴스를 공유</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 지정</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: This method always returns `false` if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified is an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> that has a different implementation than the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 항상 반환 `false` 경우 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 현재 서로 다른 구현이</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 지정</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> positioned on the node that you want to move to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 를 이동 하려는 노드에 배치 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the same position as the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 경우는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 성공적으로 지정된 된 같은 위치 이동 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>의 위치는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 변경 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the attribute with the matching local name and namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: 이동 된 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 특성으로 일치 하는 로컬 이름 및 네임 스페이스 URI입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not currently positioned on an element, this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>현재 맞춰지지 않습니다 요소에이 메서드가 반환 `false`.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: After a successful call to MoveToAttribute, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A> properties reflect the values of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: MoveToAttribute을 성공적으로 호출한 후에 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI%2A>및 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A>속성 특성의 값을 반영 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an attribute, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>특성을 메서드에 배치 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>적용 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the navigator.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 메서드는 항상 반환 `false` 탐색기의 위치를 변경 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Rather, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A> to move to the next attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 대신, 호출할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A>다음 특성 노드를 이동할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once positioned on an attribute, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move to the owner element.
trans-unit.target: 특성에 위치를 호출할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>, 소유자 요소의 전환할.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>

trans-unit.source: The local name of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 특성의 로컬 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the attribute; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the child node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the child node with the local name and namespace URI specified.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the child node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 경우는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 자식 노드로 성공적으로 이동 되지 않았으면, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the first sibling node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 이동 된 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 현재 노드의 첫 번째 형제 노드로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the first sibling node of the current node; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if there is no first sibling, or if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is currently positioned on an attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 경우는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 가 현재 노드의 첫 번째 형제 노드로 성공적으로 이동 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 없으면 첫 번째 형제는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 가 현재 특성 노드에 배치 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is already positioned on the first sibling, <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> will return <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and will not move its position.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 가 이미 있는 첫 번째 형제 노드에 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 돌아갑니다 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 있으며의 위치를 이동 하지 것입니다.

trans-unit.source: If MoveToFirst returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> because there is no first sibling, or if <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is currently positioned on an attribute, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: MoveToFirst 반환 하는 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 첫 번째 형제를이 있거나 경우 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 가 현재 특성의 위치에 배치 되는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 변경 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the first attribute of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 된 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 현재 노드의 첫 번째 특성으로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not currently positioned on an element, this method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not change.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>현재 맞춰지지 않습니다 요소에이 메서드가 반환 `false` 의 위치와는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>변경 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: After a successful call to MoveToFirstAttribute, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A> properties reflect the values of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: MoveToFirstAttribute을 성공적으로 호출한 후에 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI%2A>및 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A>속성 특성의 값을 반영 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an attribute, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>특성을 메서드에 배치 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>적용 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 메서드는 항상 반환 `false` <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 의 위치를 변경 하지 않습니다

trans-unit.source: Rather, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A> to move to the next attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 대신, 호출할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A>다음 특성 노드를 이동할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an attribute, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move to the owner element.
trans-unit.target: 후는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>배치 되는 특성을 호출할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>, 소유자 요소의를 이동 하.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the first attribute of the current node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 경우는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 고, 그러지 않으면 현재 노드의 첫 번째 특성으로 이동 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>의 위치는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 변경 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the first child node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 된 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 현재 노드의 첫 번째 자식 노드를 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> are the only two <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> values that can have children.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>및 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>은 유일한 두 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>자식을 가질 수 있는 값입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `false` for all other <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> node types.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 항상 반환 `false` 다른 모든 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>노드 형식입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the first child node of the current node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 경우는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 고, 그러지 않으면 현재 노드의 첫 번째 자식 노드로 성공적으로 이동 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>의 위치는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 변경 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to first namespace node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 이동 된 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 현재 노드의 첫 번째 네임 스페이스 노드에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class returns namespace nodes in reverse document order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>클래스 문서와 반대 순서로 네임 스페이스 노드를 반환 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, MoveToFirstNamespace essentially moves to the last namespace node in the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 MoveToFirstNamespace 기본적으로 마지막으로 네임 스페이스 노드로 이동 현재 범위입니다.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> has been moved to the namespace node, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> property reflects the name of the namespace.
trans-unit.target: 이후에 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>네임 스페이스 노드로 이동 되었습니다는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A>속성은 네임 스페이스 이름을 반영 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a namespace node, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>메서드 네임 스페이스 노드에 배치 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>적용 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 메서드는 항상 반환 `false` <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 의 위치를 변경 하지 않습니다

trans-unit.source: Rather, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A> to move to the next namespace node.
trans-unit.target: 대신, 호출할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A>다음 네임 스페이스 노드로 이동 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an namespace node, call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move back to the element node.
trans-unit.target: 이후에 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>호출, 네임 스페이스 노드에 배치 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>요소 노드를 다시 이동 하려면.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: For a definition of namespace nodes, see section 5.4 of the W3C XML Path Language (XPath) recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model.
trans-unit.target: 네임 스페이스 노드 정의 http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model에 있는 W3C XML 경로 언어 (XPath) 권장 사항의 섹션 5.4를 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the first namespace node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the first namespace node that matches the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope"></xref> specified.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 일치 하는 첫 번째 네임 스페이스 노드는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope"> </xref> 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class returns namespace nodes in reverse document order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>클래스 문서와 반대 순서로 네임 스페이스 노드를 반환 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, MoveToFirstNamespace essentially moves to the last namespace node in the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 MoveToFirstNamespace 기본적으로 마지막으로 네임 스페이스 노드로 이동 현재 범위입니다.

trans-unit.source: Using the following XML fragment as an example, if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the `data` node, MoveToFirstNamespace behaves in the following manner.
trans-unit.target: 경우 예를 들어, 다음 XML 조각은 사용 하는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>에 배치 되는 `data` 다음과 같은 방식으로 노드를 MoveToFirstNamespace 동작.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.All)` moves to one of the following namespace nodes: `xmlns:c='C'`, `xmlns:a='A2'`, `xmlns=''`, `xmlns:b='B'`, or `xmlns:xml='http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace'`.
trans-unit.target: - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.All)` 네임 스페이스 노드 중 하나로 이동: `xmlns:c='C'`, `xmlns:a='A2'`, `xmlns=''`, `xmlns:b='B'`, 또는 `xmlns:xml='http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace'`합니다.

trans-unit.source: - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.ExcludeXml)` moves to one of the following namespace nodes: `xmlns:c='C'`, `xmlns:a='A2'`, `xmlns=''`, or `xmlns:b='B'`.
trans-unit.target: - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.ExcludeXml)` 네임 스페이스 노드 중 하나로 이동: `xmlns:c='C'`, `xmlns:a='A2'`, `xmlns=''`, 또는 `xmlns:b='B'`합니다.

trans-unit.source: - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.Local)` moves to the `xmlns:c='C'` node.
trans-unit.target: - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.Local)` 이동는 `xmlns:c='C'` 노드.

trans-unit.source: ``` <root xmlns='urn:default' xmlns:a='A1' xmlns:b='B'> <item xmlns='' xmlns:a='A2'> <data xmlns:c='C' /> </item> </root> ``` If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not currently positioned on an element, this method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not change.
trans-unit.target: ``` <root xmlns='urn:default' xmlns:a='A1' xmlns:b='B'> <item xmlns='' xmlns:a='A2'> <data xmlns:c='C' /> </item> </root> ```경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>현재 맞춰지지 않습니다 요소에이 메서드가 반환 `false` 의 위치와는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>변경 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> has been moved to the namespace node, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> property reflects the name of the namespace.
trans-unit.target: 이후에 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>네임 스페이스 노드로 이동 되었습니다는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A>속성은 네임 스페이스 이름을 반영 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a namespace node, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.

trans-unit.source: - The MoveToFollowing method does not move to attribute or namespace nodes.
trans-unit.target: -MoveToFollowing 메서드 특성 또는 네임 스페이스 노드로 이동 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> cannot be <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> or <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> cannot be <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> or <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the element with the local name and namespace URI specified in document order.
trans-unit.target: 이동 된 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 된 로컬 이름 및 네임 스페이스 URI 문서 순서에 지정 된 요소에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If the MoveToFollowing method returns `false`, the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: MoveToFollowing 메서드에서 반환 되 면 `false`의 위치는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>변경 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The local name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 요소의 로컬 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the element.
trans-unit.target: 네임 스페이스 URI는 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> moved successfully; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 성공적으로 이동 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the following element of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> specified, to the boundary specified, in document order.
trans-unit.target: 이동 된 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 의 다음 요소에는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"> </xref> 문서 순서에 지정 된 경계를 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: - The MoveToFollowing method does not move to attribute or namespace nodes.
trans-unit.target: -MoveToFollowing 메서드 특성 또는 네임 스페이스 노드로 이동 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> parameter value is <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, the MoveToFollowing method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>매개 변수 값이 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>또는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, MoveToFollowing 메서드 반환 `false` 의 위치와는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>변경 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary passed as a parameter is not positioned after the position of the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: If는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>매개 변수로 전달 하는 경계가 현재 위치 뒤 배치 되지 않은 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>는 무시 됩니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary passed as a parameter is `null` the next following node with the specified <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> is located in document order.
trans-unit.target: -If <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>매개 변수로 전달 하는 경계는 `null` 지정 된 다음 다음 노드로 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>문서 순서로 배치 됩니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> methods cannot be used to move to attribute or namespace nodes.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A>특성 또는 네임 스페이스 노드로 이동 하는 메서드를 사용할 수 없습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary passed as a parameter is positioned over an attribute or namespace node, it is equivalent to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary parameter having been positioned on the first child node of its parent element.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>은 해당 하는 매개 변수가 특성 또는 네임 스페이스 노드 위에 배치 된 변수로 전달 된 경계는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>경계 매개 변수는 부모 요소의 첫 번째 자식 노드의 위치를 지정 하지.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the parent element of the attribute or namespace node that the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary parameter is positioned on can be matched by this method.
trans-unit.target: 이렇게 하면 특성 또는 네임 스페이스 노드의 부모 요소는는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>경계 매개 변수 위치가이 메서드에 의해 사용할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> method returns `false`, the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: If는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A>메서드 반환 `false`의 위치는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>변경 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> of the element.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"> </xref> 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> cannot be <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> or <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> cannot be <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> or <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object positioned on the element boundary which the current <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> will not move past while searching for the following element.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 요소 경계에 있는 현재 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 지난 다음 요소를 검색 하는 동안 이동 하지 것입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> moved successfully; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 성공적으로 이동 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the element with the local name and namespace URI specified, to the boundary specified, in document order.
trans-unit.target: 이동 된 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 로컬 이름과 네임 스페이스 URI 지정 된 문서 순서에 지정 된 경계에 있는 요소에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary passed as a parameter is not positioned after the position of the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: -경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>매개 변수로 전달 하는 경계가 현재 위치 뒤 배치 되지 않은 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>는 무시 됩니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary parameter is `null`, the following element with the local name and namespace URI specified is located in document order.
trans-unit.target: If는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>경계 매개 변수는 `null`, 문서 순서에 따라 로컬 이름 및 네임 스페이스 URI와 다음과 같은 요소가 있는.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A> methods cannot be used to move to attribute or namespace nodes.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A>특성 또는 네임 스페이스 노드로 이동 하는 메서드를 사용할 수 없습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFollowing%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary passed as a parameter is positioned over an attribute or namespace node, it is equivalent to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary parameter having been positioned on the first child node of its parent element.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>은 해당 하는 매개 변수가 특성 또는 네임 스페이스 노드 위에 배치 된 변수로 전달 된 경계는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>경계 매개 변수는 부모 요소의 첫 번째 자식 노드의 위치를 지정 하지.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the parent element of the attribute or namespace node that the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary parameter is positioned on can be matched by this method.
trans-unit.target: 이렇게 하면 특성 또는 네임 스페이스 노드의 부모 요소는는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>경계 매개 변수 위치가이 메서드에 의해 사용할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - If the MoveToFollowing method returns `false`, the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: -MoveToFollowing 메서드에서 반환 되 면 `false`의 위치는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>변경 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The local name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 요소의 로컬 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the element.
trans-unit.target: 네임 스페이스 URI는 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object positioned on the element boundary which the current <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> will not move past while searching for the following element.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 요소 경계에 있는 현재 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 지난 다음 요소를 검색 하는 동안 이동 하지 것입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> moved successfully; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 성공적으로 이동 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves to the node that has an attribute of type `ID` whose value matches the specified <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 형식의 특성을 가진 노드로 이동 하는 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면 `ID` <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> 지정 된 일치 하는 값을 갖는

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to identify nodes by unique `ID` provided the source document explicitly declares attributes of type `ID` using a DTD.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드 수 있습니다 사용할 노드를 식별 하 여 고유 `ID` 소스 문서 유형에 대 한 특성을 명시적으로 선언 제공 `ID` DTD를 사용 하 여 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose the following XML data, `<data><x a="a1"/></data>`, was loaded using a DTD that included the following: `<!ATTLIST x a ID #REQUIRED>`.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 다음 XML 데이터 `<data><x a="a1"/></data>`, 다음을 포함 한 DTD를 사용 하 여 로드 된: `<!ATTLIST x a ID #REQUIRED>`합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> was positioned somewhere in the XML data, calling `MoveToId("a1")` positions the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> on the element node `x`.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>호출 하는 XML 데이터의 어딘가에 위치한 `MoveToId("a1")` 위치는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>요소 노드에 `x`.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing the `ID` value of the node to which you want to move.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>나타내는 `ID` 이동 하려는 노드의 값입니다.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 완료 되 고, 그렇지 않으면 이동 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the navigator is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, 탐색기의 위치는 변경 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the namespace node with the specified namespace prefix.
trans-unit.target: 이동 된 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 지정 된 네임 스페이스 접두사와 네임 스페이스 노드를 합니다.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> has been moved to the namespace node, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> property reflects the name of the namespace.
trans-unit.target: 이후에 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>네임 스페이스 노드로 이동 되었습니다는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A>속성은 네임 스페이스 이름을 반영 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a namespace node, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>메서드 네임 스페이스 노드에 배치 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>적용 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 메서드는 항상 반환 `false` <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 의 위치를 변경 하지 않습니다

trans-unit.source: Rather, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A> to move to the next namespace node.
trans-unit.target: 대신, 호출할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A>다음 네임 스페이스 노드로 이동 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a namespace node, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move back to the element node.
trans-unit.target: 후는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>배치 되는 네임 스페이스 노드나 호출할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>요소 노드를 다시 이동 하려면.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: For a definition of namespace nodes, see section 5.4 of the W3C XML Path Language (XPath) recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model.
trans-unit.target: 네임 스페이스 노드 정의 http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model에 있는 W3C XML 경로 언어 (XPath) 권장 사항의 섹션 5.4를 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: The namespace prefix of the namespace node.
trans-unit.target: 네임 스페이스 노드의 네임 스페이스 접두사입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the specified namespace; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if a matching namespace node was not found, or if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is not positioned on an element node.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 성공적으로 지정된 된 네임 스페이스; 이동 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 일치 하는 네임 스페이스 노드를 찾을 수 없습니다, 아니면는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 요소 노드에 배치 되지 않았습니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>의 위치는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 변경 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the next sibling node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 된 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 현재 노드의 다음 형제 노드로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the next sibling node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if there are no more siblings or if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is currently positioned on an attribute node.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 다음 형제 노드로 성공적으로 이동 되지 않았으면, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 형제 경우 또는 경우는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 가 현재 특성 노드에 배치 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>의 위치는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 변경 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the next sibling node of the current node that matches the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> specified.
trans-unit.target: 이동 된 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 일치 하는 현재 노드의 다음 형제 노드로 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"> </xref> 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The return value of the MoveToNext method depends on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node and the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the next sibling node to move to.
trans-unit.target: MoveToNext 메서드의 반환 값에 따라 달라 집니다는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>현재 노드 및 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>이동 하려는 다음 형제 노드의의.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the different <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nodes and the sibling nodes they can move to.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 서로 다른 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>노드와 형제 노드를 이동할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>
