trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> of the sibling node to move to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"> </xref> 의 형제 노드를 이동할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the next sibling node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if there are no more siblings or if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is currently positioned on an attribute node.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 다음 형제 노드로 성공적으로 이동 되지 않았으면, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 형제 경우 또는 경우는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 가 현재 특성 노드에 배치 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>의 위치는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 변경 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the next sibling node with the local name and namespace URI specified.
trans-unit.target: 이동 된 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 를 다음 형제 노드로 된 로컬 이름과 네임 스페이스 URI가 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The local name of the next sibling node to move to.
trans-unit.target: 이동 하려는 다음 형제 노드의의 로컬 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the next sibling node to move to.
trans-unit.target: 네임 스페이스 다음 형제 노드로 URI로 이동 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the next sibling node; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if there are no more siblings, or if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is currently positioned on an attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 경우는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 성공적 다음 형제 노드로;으로 이동 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 형제 경우 또는 경우는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 가 현재 특성 노드에 배치 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>의 위치는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 변경 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the next attribute.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 된 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 다음 특성으로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not currently positioned on an attribute, this method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not change.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>현재에 배치 되지 않은 특성에이 메서드가 반환 `false` 의 위치와는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>변경 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an attribute, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> methods are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>특성을 메서드에 배치 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>메서드가 적용 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 메서드는 항상 반환 `false` <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 의 위치를 변경 하지 않습니다

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an attribute, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move to the owner element.
trans-unit.target: 후는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>배치 되는 특성을 호출할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>, 소유자 요소의를 이동 하.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the next attribute; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if there are no more attributes.
trans-unit.target: 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 경우는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 성공적 다음 특성으로 이동 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 더 이상 특성이 없으면 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>의 위치는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 변경 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the next namespace node.
trans-unit.target: 이동의 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 다음 네임 스페이스 노드에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class returns namespace nodes in reverse document order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>클래스 문서와 반대 순서로 네임 스페이스 노드를 반환 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, MoveToNextNamespace essentially moves to the namespace node above the one in the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 MoveToNextNamespace는 기본적으로 위에 현재 범위에서 네임 스페이스 노드로 이동합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not currently positioned on a namespace node, this method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not change.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>현재 맞춰지지 않습니다 네임 스페이스 노드를이 메서드가 반환 `false` 의 위치와는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>변경 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a namespace node, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>메서드 네임 스페이스 노드에 배치 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>적용 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 메서드는 항상 반환 `false` <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 의 위치를 변경 하지 않습니다

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an namespace node, call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move back to the element node.
trans-unit.target: 이후에 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>호출, 네임 스페이스 노드에 배치 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>요소 노드를 다시 이동 하려면.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: For a definition of namespace nodes, see section 5.4 of the W3C XML Path Language (XPath) recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model.
trans-unit.target: 네임 스페이스 노드 정의 http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model에 있는 W3C XML 경로 언어 (XPath) 권장 사항의 섹션 5.4를 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the next namespace node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 경우는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 다음 네임 스페이스 노드로 이동 합니다. 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>의 위치는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 변경 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the next namespace node matching the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope"></xref> specified.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 를 일치 하는 다음 네임 스페이스 노드는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope"> </xref> 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class returns namespace nodes in reverse document order.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not currently positioned on a namespace node, this method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not change.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>현재 맞춰지지 않습니다 네임 스페이스 노드를이 메서드가 반환 `false` 의 위치와는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>변경 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a namespace node, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>메서드 네임 스페이스 노드에 배치 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>적용 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an namespace node, call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move back to the element node.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope"></xref> value describing the namespace scope.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope"> </xref> 네임 스페이스 범위를 설명 하는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the next namespace node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 경우는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 다음 네임 스페이스 노드로 이동 합니다. 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>의 위치는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 변경 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the parent node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 된 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 현재 노드의 부모 노드에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The return value of the MoveToParent method depends on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node, and the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the parent node to move to.
trans-unit.target: MoveToParent 메서드의 반환 값에 따라 달라 집니다는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>현재 노드 및 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>이동 하려면 부모 노드의.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the different <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nodes, and the parent nodes they can move to.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 서로 다른 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>노드와 부모 노드를 이동할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.target: | XPathNodeType | 부모 노드 | |-------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>노드에 부모는 없습니다. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>또는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>노드. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>노드. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>노드. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>노드. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>또는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>노드. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>또는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>노드. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>또는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>노드. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> node.|</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the parent node of the current node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 경우는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 고, 그러지 않으면 현재 노드의 부모 노드로 성공적으로 이동 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>의 위치는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 변경 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the previous sibling node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 된 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 현재 노드의 이전 형제 노드로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the previous sibling node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if there is no previous sibling node or if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is currently positioned on an attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 경우는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 이전 형제 노드로 성공적으로 이동 되지 않았으면, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 이전 형제 노드가 없으면는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 가 현재 특성 노드에 배치 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>의 위치는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 변경 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the root node that the current node belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 이동의 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 현재 노드가 속한는 루트 노드에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: All nodes belong to one and only one document.
trans-unit.target: 모든 노드는 하나의 문서에 속해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, this method is always successful.
trans-unit.target: 따라서이 메서드는 항상 성공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the qualified name of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면 현재 노드의 정규화 된 이름을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The Name returned depends on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 반환 되는 이름에 따라 달라 집니다는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>현재 노드의.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: For example, the name for the `<bk:book>` element is `bk:book`.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 이름에 대 한는 `<bk:book>` 요소는 `bk:book`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the value returned by the Name property, based on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 Name 속성을 기반으로 하 여 반환 되는 값은 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>현재 노드의.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: |XPathNodeType|Property Value| |-------------------|--------------------| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The qualified name of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.
trans-unit.target: | XPathNodeType | 속성 값 | |-------------------|--------------------| | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> 의 정규화 된 이름을</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: In the following example, `<bk:book>`, the name of the element node is `bk:book`.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The qualified name of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예에서 `<bk:book>`, 요소 노드 이름은 `bk:book`. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> 의 정규화 된 이름을</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: In the following example, `<book bk:genre='novel'>`, the name of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> node is `bk:genre`.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The prefix associated with the namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예에서 `<book bk:genre='novel'>`, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>노드의 이름은 `bk:genre`. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| 네임 스페이스 URI와 관련 된.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: In the following namespace declaration, `xmlns:bk='urn:samples'`, the Name property returns `bk`.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The target of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 네임 스페이스 선언에서 `xmlns:bk='urn:samples'`, Name 속성은 반환 `bk`. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> 대상</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: In the following example, `<?xml-stylesheet type='text/xsl' href= 'books.xsl'?>`, the Name property returns `xml-stylesheet`.| |All other <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nodes|<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.|
trans-unit.target: 다음 예에서 `<?xml-stylesheet type='text/xsl' href= 'books.xsl'?>`, Name 속성은 반환 `xml-stylesheet`. | | 다른 모든 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>노드 |<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>. |</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the qualified Name of the current node, or <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> if the current node does not have a name (for example, text or comment nodes).
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>현재 노드의 정규화 된 이름을 포함 하는 또는 <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> 이름 (예: 텍스트 또는 주석 노드) 하는 경우 현재 노드가 없습니다.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the namespace URI of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면 현재 노드의 URI 네임 스페이스를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI returned depends on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: URI 반환 되는 네임 스페이스에 따라 달라 집니다는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>현재 노드의.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: The NamespaceURI property returns `urn:samples` for the node `<bk:book xmlns:bk='urn:samples'>`.
trans-unit.target: NamespaceURI 속성은 반환 `urn:samples` 노드에 대 한 `<bk:book xmlns:bk='urn:samples'>`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Only <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType><xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nodes can have a namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: 만 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>및 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType><xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>노드는 네임 스페이스 URI를 가질 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the namespace URI of the current node, or <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> if the current node has no namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>URI 현재 노드의 네임 스페이스를 포함 하는 또는 <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> 현재 노드에 네임 스페이스 URI가 없는 경우.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable> of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>의 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable> stores atomized strings of any local name, namespace URI, and prefix used by the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>저장소의 모든 로컬 이름, 네임 스페이스 URI 및에 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 사용 되는 접두사 문자열 원자화</xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>

trans-unit.source: This means that when the same <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> is returned multiple times (like "book"), the same <xref:System.String> object is returned for that <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 즉 동일한 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A>여러 번 (예: "책")는 반환 된 <xref:System.String> <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> 에 대 한 개체를 반환 하는</xref:System.String> 동일한</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible to write efficient code that does object comparisons on these strings, instead of expensive string comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 개체 비용이 많이 드는 문자열 비교 대신이 문자열에 대해 비교를 수행 하는 효율적인 코드를 작성할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable> object enabling you to get the atomized version of a <xref:System.String> within the XML document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>의 원자화 된 버전을 가져올 수 있도록 하는 개체는 <xref:System.String>XML 문서 내에서.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IEqualityComparer> used for equality comparison of <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref:System.Collections.IEqualityComparer>의 같음 비교에 사용 되는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 개체.</xref:System.Collections.IEqualityComparer>

trans-unit.source: The NavigatorComparer property allows <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> objects to be compared on the basis of position rather than reference to the object.
trans-unit.target: NavigatorComparer 속성을 사용 하면 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>개체를 개체에 대 한 참조 아닌 위치를 기준으로 비교할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.ComparePosition%2A> and <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> methods implemented by this class are based on the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> objects passed as parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.ComparePosition%2A>및 <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>의 위치를 기반으로 하는이 클래스에서 구현 된 메서드에 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>매개 변수로 전달 된 개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.ComparePosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A> method implemented by this class uses the properties of the node such as its local name and namespace URI to create a hash code for the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A>이 클래스에서 구현 하는 메서드 노드의 로컬 이름 및 네임 스페이스 URI 같은 속성을 사용 하 여 노드에 대 한 해시 코드를 만듭니다.</xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEqualityComparer> used for equality comparison of <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEqualityComparer>의 같음 비교에 사용 되는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 개체.</xref:System.Collections.IEqualityComparer>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"> </xref> 현재 노드의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> values representing the current node.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"> </xref> 현재 노드를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the markup representing the opening and closing tags of the current node and its child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 여는 태그와 닫는 태그를 현재 노드와 해당 자식 노드를 나타내는 태그를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the markup representing the opening and closing tags of the current node and its child nodes.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>여는 태그와 닫는 태그를 현재 노드와 해당 자식 노드를 나타내는 태그를 포함 하는.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the namespace prefix associated with the current node.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면 현재 노드와 관련 된 네임 스페이스 접두사를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The Prefix property gets the namespace prefix associated with the current node.
trans-unit.target: Prefix 속성 현재 노드와 관련 된 네임 스페이스 접두사를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, the Prefix property returns `bk` for the `<bk:book>` element.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, Prefix 속성 반환 `bk` 에 대 한는 `<bk:book>` 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: If a prefix does not exist, or the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node is not <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, the Prefix property returns <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 접두사가 없으면 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, Prefix 속성 반환 <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> 또는</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> 하지는 현재 노드의</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> 또는

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the namespace prefix associated with the current node.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>현재 노드와 관련 된 네임 스페이스 접두사를 포함 하는.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object used to create a new child node at the beginning of the list of child nodes of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>개체를 현재 노드의 노드 자식 목록 맨 앞에 새 자식 노드를 만드는 데 사용 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: Prepending a child node adds the new node to the beginning of the list of child nodes for the current node.
trans-unit.target: 현재 노드의 자식 노드 목록 맨 앞으로 새 노드를 추가 자식 노드 앞에 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the prepended node becomes the first child node.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 세 개의 자식 노드는 요소에 대 한 존재 앞에 추가 노드는 첫 번째 자식 노드가 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created.
trans-unit.target: 자식 노드가 있는 경우 새 자식 노드가 만들어집니다.

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the PrependChild method.
trans-unit.target: 다음은 PrependChild 메서드를 사용할 때 고려해 야 할 중요 한 참고 사항입니다.

trans-unit.source: - The new child node is not inserted until the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object is called.
trans-unit.target: 될 때까지-새 자식 노드 삽입 되지 않고는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A>의 메서드는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>개체를 호출 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> </xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The PrependChild method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element node.
trans-unit.target: -PrependChild 메서드는 경우에만 유효는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>요소 노드에 배치 됩니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The PrependChild method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -PrependChild 메서드 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 의 위치에 영향을 주지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object used to create a new child node at the beginning of the list of child nodes of the current node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>개체를 현재 노드의 노드 자식 목록 맨 앞에 새 자식 노드를 만드는 데 사용 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: The current node the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is positioned on does not allow a new child node to be prepended.
trans-unit.target: 현재 노드는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 가 배치를 새로운 자식 노드를 앞에 추가 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 편집을 지원 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new child node at the beginning of the list of child nodes of the current node using the XML string specified.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 XML 문자열을 사용 하 여 현재 노드의 노드 자식 목록 맨 앞에 새 자식 노드를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: Prepending a child node adds the new node to the beginning of the list of child nodes for the current node.
trans-unit.target: 현재 노드의 자식 노드 목록 맨 앞으로 새 노드를 추가 자식 노드 앞에 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the prepended node becomes the first child node.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 세 개의 자식 노드는 요소에 대 한 존재 앞에 추가 노드는 첫 번째 자식 노드가 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created.
trans-unit.target: 자식 노드가 있는 경우 새 자식 노드가 만들어집니다.

trans-unit.source: To create a new element node, include all XML syntax in the XML string parameter.
trans-unit.target: 새 요소 노드를 만들려면 XML 문자열 매개 변수에서 모든 XML 구문을 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The string for a new `book` node is `PrependChild("<book/>")`.
trans-unit.target: 새 항목에 대 한 문자열 `book` 노드는 `PrependChild("<book/>")`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The string for appending the text "book" to the current node's text node is `PrependChild("book")`.
trans-unit.target: 현재 노드의 텍스트에 "book" 텍스트를 추가 하는 문자열은 `PrependChild("book")`합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the XML string contains multiple nodes, all nodes are added.
trans-unit.target: XML 문자열에 여러 개의 노드가 포함 된 경우 모든 노드가 추가 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the PrependChild method.
trans-unit.target: 다음은 PrependChild 메서드를 사용할 때 고려해 야 할 중요 한 참고 사항입니다.

trans-unit.source: - The PrependChild method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element node.
trans-unit.target: -PrependChild 메서드는 경우에만 유효는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>요소 노드에 배치 됩니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The PrependChild method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -PrependChild 메서드 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 의 위치에 영향을 주지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The XML data string for the new child node.
trans-unit.target: 새 자식 노드에 대 한 XML 데이터 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: The XML string parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: XML 문자열 매개 변수는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The current node the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is positioned on does not allow a new child node to be prepended.
trans-unit.target: 현재 노드는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 가 배치를 새로운 자식 노드를 앞에 추가 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 편집을 지원 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The XML string parameter is not well-formed.
trans-unit.target: XML 문자열 매개 변수가 올바르지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new child node at the beginning of the list of child nodes of the current node using the XML contents of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object specified.
trans-unit.target: XML 콘텐츠를 사용 하 여 현재 노드의 노드 자식 목록의 시작 부분에 새 자식 노드를 만듭니다는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>지정 된 개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Prepending a child node adds the new node to the beginning of the list of child nodes for the current node.
trans-unit.target: 현재 노드의 자식 노드 목록 맨 앞으로 새 노드를 추가 자식 노드 앞에 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the prepended node becomes the first child node.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 세 개의 자식 노드는 요소에 대 한 존재 앞에 추가 노드는 첫 번째 자식 노드가 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created.
trans-unit.target: 자식 노드가 있는 경우 새 자식 노드가 만들어집니다.

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the PrependChild method.
trans-unit.target: 다음은 PrependChild 메서드를 사용할 때 고려해 야 할 중요 한 참고 사항입니다.

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object is positioned over a sequence of XML nodes, all the nodes in the sequence are added.
trans-unit.target: If는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>개체가 XML 노드 시퀀스에 대해 위치, 시퀀스에 있는 모든 노드가 추가 됩니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: - The PrependChild method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element node.
trans-unit.target: -PrependChild 메서드는 경우에만 유효는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>요소 노드에 배치 됩니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The PrependChild method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -PrependChild 메서드 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 의 위치에 영향을 주지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object positioned on the XML data for the new child node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>새 자식 노드에 대 한 XML 데이터에.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object is in an error state or closed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>개체가 오류 상태 이거나 닫혀 있습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>개체 매개 변수는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The current node the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is positioned on does not allow a new child node to be prepended.
trans-unit.target: 현재 노드는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 가 배치를 새로운 자식 노드를 앞에 추가 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 편집을 지원 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The XML contents of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object parameter is not well-formed.
trans-unit.target: XML 콘텐츠는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>개체 매개 변수가 올바른 형식이 아닙니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new child node at the beginning of the list of child nodes of the current node using the nodes in the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object specified.
trans-unit.target: 노드를 사용 하 여 현재 노드의 노드 자식 목록의 시작 부분에 새 자식 노드를 만듭니다는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 지정 된 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Prepending a child node adds the new node to the beginning of the list of child nodes for the current node.
trans-unit.target: 현재 노드의 자식 노드 목록 맨 앞으로 새 노드를 추가 자식 노드 앞에 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the prepended node becomes the first child node.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 세 개의 자식 노드는 요소에 대 한 존재 앞에 추가 노드는 첫 번째 자식 노드가 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created.
trans-unit.target: 자식 노드가 있는 경우 새 자식 노드가 만들어집니다.

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the PrependChild method.
trans-unit.target: 다음은 PrependChild 메서드를 사용할 때 고려해 야 할 중요 한 참고 사항입니다.

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object is positioned over a sequence of XML nodes, all the nodes in the sequence are added.
trans-unit.target: If는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>개체가 XML 노드 시퀀스에 대해 위치, 시퀀스에 있는 모든 노드가 추가 됩니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The PrependChild method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element node.
trans-unit.target: -PrependChild 메서드는 경우에만 유효는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>요소 노드에 배치 됩니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The PrependChild method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -PrependChild 메서드 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 의 위치에 영향을 주지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object positioned on the node to add as the new child node.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 새 자식 노드로 추가할 노드에 배치 되는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 개체 매개 변수는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The current node the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is positioned on does not allow a new child node to be prepended.
trans-unit.target: 현재 노드는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 가 배치를 새로운 자식 노드를 앞에 추가 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 편집을 지원 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new child element at the beginning of the list of child nodes of the current node using the namespace prefix, local name, and namespace URI specified with the value specified.
trans-unit.target: 노드는 네임 스페이스 접두사, 로컬 이름 및 네임 스페이스 값이 지정 된 URI 사용 하 여 현재 노드의 자식 목록 맨 앞에 새 자식 요소를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: Prepending a child node adds the new node to the beginning of the list of child nodes for the current node.
trans-unit.target: 현재 노드의 자식 노드 목록 맨 앞으로 새 노드를 추가 자식 노드 앞에 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the prepended node becomes the first child node.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 세 개의 자식 노드는 요소에 대 한 존재 앞에 추가 노드는 첫 번째 자식 노드가 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created.
trans-unit.target: 자식 노드가 있는 경우 새 자식 노드가 만들어집니다.

trans-unit.source: Namespace prefix and URI values can be obtained by using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 Namespace 접두사 및 URI 값을 가져올 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A>또는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the following syntax prepends a child element by using the in-scope namespace `xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`: ``` navigator.PrependChildElement(navigator.Prefix, "pages", LookupNamespaceURI(navigator.Prefix), String.Empty) ``` This creates the new child `<bk:pages/>` element.
trans-unit.target: 다음 구문을 범위 내의 네임 스페이스를 사용 하 여 자식 요소를 추가 하는 예를 들어 `xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`: ``` navigator.PrependChildElement(navigator.Prefix, "pages", LookupNamespaceURI(navigator.Prefix), String.Empty) ``` 새 자식 그렇기 때문에 `<bk:pages/>` 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the PrependChildElement method.
trans-unit.target: 다음은 PrependChildElement 메서드를 사용할 때 고려해 야 할 중요 한 참고 사항입니다.

trans-unit.source: - If the namespace prefix specified is `null` or <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, then the prefix for the namespace URI of the new element is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope.
trans-unit.target: -지정 된 네임 스페이스 접두사는 경우 `null` 또는 <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, 다음 현재 네임 스페이스 범위 내에서 새 요소의 URI 네임 스페이스의 접두사를 가져옵니다.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, then a namespace prefix is automatically generated.
trans-unit.target: URI 현재 범위에서 지정된 된 네임 스페이스에 할당 된 네임 스페이스 접두사가 없으면 네임 스페이스 접두사를 자동으로 생성 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: - The PrependChildElement method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element node.
trans-unit.target: -PrependChildElement 메서드는 경우에만 유효는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>요소 노드에 배치 됩니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The PrependChildElement method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -PrependChildElement 메서드 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 의 위치에 영향을 주지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The namespace prefix of the new child element (if any).
trans-unit.target: 새 자식 요소 (있는 경우)의 네임 스페이스 접두사입니다.

trans-unit.source: The local name of the new child element (if any).
trans-unit.target: 새 자식 요소 (있는 경우)의 로컬 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the new child element (if any).
trans-unit.target: 네임 스페이스 URI 새 자식 요소 (있는 경우).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>및 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 동일 합니다.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The value of the new child element.
trans-unit.target: 새 자식 요소의 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.String> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> are passed, an empty element is created.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.String>또는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 을 전달 하면 빈 요소가 생성 됩니다.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The current node the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is positioned on does not allow a new child node to be prepended.
trans-unit.target: 현재 노드는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 가 배치를 새로운 자식 노드를 앞에 추가 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 편집을 지원 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object that contains the current node and its child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>현재 노드와 해당 자식 노드를 포함 하는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object is created with the current node and its child nodes, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object's <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadState%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Xml.ReadState>.
trans-unit.target: 때 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>개체가 현재 노드 및 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadState%2A> <xref:System.Xml.ReadState>.</xref:System.Xml.ReadState> 속성은</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadState%2A> 개체의</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> 자식 노드를 사용 하 여 만들어집니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object's <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A> method is called for the first time, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> is moved to the current node of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 때 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>개체의 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>메서드는 처음으로 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 현재 노드로 이동</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object continues to read until the end of the XML tree is reached.
trans-unit.target: 새 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>개체 계속 XML 트리 끝에 도달할 때까지 읽습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: At this point, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A> method returns `false` and the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object's <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadState%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Xml.ReadState>.
trans-unit.target: 이 시점에서 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>메서드 반환 `false` <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadState%2A> <xref:System.Xml.ReadState>.</xref:System.Xml.ReadState> 속성은</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadState%2A> 개체의</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Changing the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>개체 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 의 위치에 영향을 주지 않는</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> 위치를 변경

trans-unit.source: Namespace declarations for the in-scope namespaces of the current node are not inserted into the XML stream provided to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: 현재 노드의 범위 내의 네임 스페이스에 대 한 Namespace 선언을에 제공 하 여 XML 스트림을 삽입 되지 않았는지는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This behavior differs from the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.WriteSubtree%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >에서이 동작은 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.WriteSubtree%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.WriteSubtree%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method creates the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object with specific reader settings, and the module that uses this method has no control over those settings.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드가 만드는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>특정 판독기 설정과이 메서드를 사용 하는 모듈 개체에는 이러한 설정 제어할 수 없습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: For example, the reader returned by this method prohibits processing Data Type Definitions (DTDs).
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어이 메서드에서 반환 하는 판독기를 금지 데이터 형식 정의 (Dtd)를 처리 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the reader attempts to read a file that uses a DTD, it will throw an error, <xref:System.Xml.XmlException>.
trans-unit.target: 판독기는 DTD를 사용 하는 파일을 읽으려고 시도, <xref:System.Xml.XmlException>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlException> 오류가 throw 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The message for the exception will be `Unexpected DTD declaration`.
trans-unit.target: 예외에 대 한 메시지 `Unexpected DTD declaration`합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can change this behavior by implementing a custom <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> that returns an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> with the desired <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>원하는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> 반환 하</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> 는 사용자 지정을 구현 하 여이 동작을 변경할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object that contains the current node and its child nodes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>현재 노드와 해당 자식 노드를 포함 하는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is not positioned on an element node or the root node.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 요소 노드나 루트 노드에 배치 되지 않았습니다.

trans-unit.source: Replaces a range of sibling nodes from the current node to the node specified.
trans-unit.target: 현재 노드부터 지정 된 노드까지의 형제 노드 범위를 바꿉니다.

trans-unit.source: The ReplaceRange method replaces a range of sibling nodes from the current node the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on (inclusive) to the node specified by the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> parameter (inclusive).
trans-unit.target: ReplaceRange 메서드 대체 현재 노드의 형제 노드 범위는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>하는 위치에 (포함)에 의해 지정 된 노드는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>매개 변수 (포함).</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The replacement range is not inserted until the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object is called.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 바꾸기 범위까지 삽입 되지 않고는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A>의 메서드는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>개체를 호출 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> </xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> positioned on the last sibling node in the range to replace.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 바꿀 범위의 마지막 형제 노드에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object used to specify the replacement range.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>바꾸기 범위를 지정 하는 데 사용 되는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> specified is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> specified is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 편집을 지원 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The last node to replace specified is not a valid sibling node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 바꿀 마지막 노드는 현재 노드의 유효한 형제 노드가 아닙니다.

trans-unit.source: Replaces the current node with the content of the string specified.
trans-unit.target: 현재 노드가 지정 된 문자열의 콘텐츠로 바꿉니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the new node on completion of the ReplaceSelf method and returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>ReplaceSelf 메서드의 완료 시 새 노드에 배치 되 고 반환 `true`.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not positioned on the new node after completion of the ReplaceSelf method when the XML input is <xref:System.String.Empty> in which case the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is either positioned on the next sibling node or the parent node if there is no next sibling node to the replaced node and the ReplaceSelf returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>맞춰지지 않습니다 새 노드 ReplaceSelf 메서드는 완료 된 후 XML 입력이 경우 <xref:System.String.Empty>는 쿼리에서 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>가 하나 위치에 부모 노드 또는 다음 형제 노드로 대체 노드를 다음 형제 노드가 있고는 ReplaceSelf 반환 `false`.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The ReplaceSelf method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.
trans-unit.target: -ReplaceSelf 메서드는 경우에만 유효는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>요소, 텍스트, 처리 명령 또는 주석 노드 놓입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - If the XML data string is not well-formed than an exception is thrown and the result of this method is equivalent to calling <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A> on the current node.
trans-unit.target: -XML 데이터 문자열 형식이 잘못 예외가 throw 되 고이 메서드의 결과 하는 것 보다 경우 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A>현재 노드에.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the XML string contains multiple nodes, all nodes are added and the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the first node in the series of nodes.
trans-unit.target: -XML 문자열에 여러 개의 노드가 포함 된 경우 모든 노드가 추가 되 고 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>일련의 노드의 첫 번째 노드에 배치 됩니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The ReplaceSelf method is not equivalent to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -ReplaceSelf 메서드가 동일 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A>

trans-unit.source: The XML data string for the new node.
trans-unit.target: 새 노드에 대 한 XML 데이터 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: The XML string parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: XML 문자열 매개 변수는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is not positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 요소, 텍스트, 처리 명령 또는 주석 노드에 배치 되지 않았습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 편집을 지원 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The XML string parameter is not well-formed.
trans-unit.target: XML 문자열 매개 변수가 올바르지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Replaces the current node with the contents of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object specified.
trans-unit.target: 내용으로 현재 노드는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>지정 된 개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the new node on completion of the ReplaceSelf method and returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>ReplaceSelf 메서드의 완료 시 새 노드에 배치 되 고 반환 `true`.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not positioned on the new node after completion of the ReplaceSelf method when the XML input is <xref:System.String.Empty> in which case the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is either positioned on the next sibling node or the parent node if there is no next sibling node to the replaced node and the ReplaceSelf returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>맞춰지지 않습니다 새 노드 ReplaceSelf 메서드는 완료 된 후 XML 입력이 경우 <xref:System.String.Empty>는 쿼리에서 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>가 하나 위치에 부모 노드 또는 다음 형제 노드로 대체 노드를 다음 형제 노드가 있고는 ReplaceSelf 반환 `false`.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The ReplaceSelf method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.
trans-unit.target: -ReplaceSelf 메서드는 경우에만 유효는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>요소, 텍스트, 처리 명령 또는 주석 노드 놓입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - If the XML data string is not well-formed than an exception is thrown and the result of this method is equivalent to calling <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A> on the current node.
trans-unit.target: -XML 데이터 문자열 형식이 잘못 예외가 throw 되 고이 메서드의 결과 하는 것 보다 경우 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A>현재 노드에.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the XML string contains multiple nodes, all nodes are added and the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the first node in the series of nodes.
trans-unit.target: -XML 문자열에 여러 개의 노드가 포함 된 경우 모든 노드가 추가 되 고 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>일련의 노드의 첫 번째 노드에 배치 됩니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The ReplaceSelf method is not equivalent to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -ReplaceSelf 메서드가 동일 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object positioned on the XML data for the new node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>새 노드에 대 한 XML 데이터에.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object is in an error state or closed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>개체가 오류 상태 이거나 닫혀 있습니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>개체 매개 변수는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is not positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 요소, 텍스트, 처리 명령 또는 주석 노드에 배치 되지 않았습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 편집을 지원 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The XML contents of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object parameter is not well-formed.
trans-unit.target: XML 콘텐츠는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>개체 매개 변수가 올바른 형식이 아닙니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Replaces the current node with the contents of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object specified.
trans-unit.target: 내용으로 현재 노드는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 지정 된 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the new node on completion of the ReplaceSelf method and returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>ReplaceSelf 메서드의 완료 시 새 노드에 배치 되 고 반환 `true`.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not positioned on the new node after completion of the ReplaceSelf method when the XML input is <xref:System.String.Empty> in which case the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is either positioned on the next sibling node or the parent node if there is no next sibling node to the replaced node and the ReplaceSelf returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>맞춰지지 않습니다 새 노드 ReplaceSelf 메서드는 완료 된 후 XML 입력이 경우 <xref:System.String.Empty>는 쿼리에서 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>가 하나 위치에 부모 노드 또는 다음 형제 노드로 대체 노드를 다음 형제 노드가 있고는 ReplaceSelf 반환 `false`.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - If the XML data string is not well-formed than an exception is thrown and the result of this method is equivalent to calling <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A> on the current node.
trans-unit.target: -XML 데이터 문자열 형식이 잘못 예외가 throw 되 고이 메서드의 결과 하는 것 보다 경우 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A>현재 노드에.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the XML string contains multiple nodes, all nodes are added and the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the first node in the series of nodes.
trans-unit.target: -XML 문자열에 여러 개의 노드가 포함 된 경우 모든 노드가 추가 되 고 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>일련의 노드의 첫 번째 노드에 배치 됩니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The ReplaceSelf method is not equivalent to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -ReplaceSelf 메서드가 동일 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.DeleteSelf%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object positioned on the new node.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 새 노드에 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 개체 매개 변수는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is not positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 요소, 텍스트, 처리 명령 또는 주석 노드에 배치 되지 않았습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 편집을 지원 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The XML contents of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object parameter is not well-formed.
trans-unit.target: XML 콘텐츠는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 개체 매개 변수가 올바른 형식이 아닙니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the schema information that has been assigned to the current node as a result of schema validation.
trans-unit.target: 스키마 유효성 검사의 결과로 현재 노드에 할당 된 스키마 정보를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Schema information can be set on <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, or on <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nodes with a non-`null`<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.ValueType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 에 스키마 정보를 설정할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, 또는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>아닌 노드`null`<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.ValueType%2A>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: If the current node is not one of the above node types, or if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> instance does not report schema information, the SchemaInfo property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 현재 노드가 이러한 노드 형식 중 하나가 아닌 경우 또는 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>인스턴스 보고 하지 않습니다 스키마 정보 SchemaInfo 속성 반환 `null`.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo"></xref> object that contains the schema information for the current node.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo"> </xref> 현재 노드에 대 한 스키마 정보를 포함 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Selects a node set, using the specified XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 XPath 식을 사용 하 여 노드 집합을 선택 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The context for the selection is the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 선택 영역에 대 한 컨텍스트는의 위치는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>이 메서드가 호출 될 때.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: After calling this method, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> returned represents the set of selected nodes.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 호출한 후의 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>반환 선택 된 노드 집합을 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> to iterate over the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>의 메서드는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>선택된 된 노드 집합을 반복 하.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following C# code iterates over the selected set of nodes.
trans-unit.target: 다음 C# 코드는 선택한 노드 집합을 반복합니다.

trans-unit.source: ``` XPathNodeIterator iterator = nav.Select("/bookstore/book"); while (iterator.MoveNext()) { Console.WriteLine(Iterator.Current.Name); } ``` The following are important notes to consider when using the Select method.
trans-unit.target: ``` XPathNodeIterator iterator = nav.Select("/bookstore/book"); while (iterator.MoveNext()) { Console.WriteLine(Iterator.Current.Name); } ```다음은 Select 메서드를 사용 하는 경우를 고려해 야 할 중요 한 참고 사항입니다.

trans-unit.source: - You can still use any of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object's navigation methods to move within the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 내에서 이동 하는 개체의 탐색 메서드</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 중 아무 메서드나 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> navigation methods are independent of the selected nodes in the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>탐색 메서드는 선택된 된 노드에 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> 무관</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - Future calls to the Select method return a new <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object that points to the selected set of nodes that matches the new Select call.
trans-unit.target: -Select 메서드에 이후 호출 반환 새 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>새로운 선택 호출 일치 하는 선택한 노드 집합을 가리키는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>

trans-unit.source: The two <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> objects are completely independent of each other.
trans-unit.target: 두 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>개체는 서로 완전히 독립적입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>

trans-unit.source: - If the XPath expression requires namespace resolution, use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A> overload, which takes an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> as its argument.
trans-unit.target: -XPath 식은 네임 스페이스 확인을 필요한 경우 사용 된 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A>오버 로드를 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>인수로.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: - This method has no effect on the state of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -이 메서드에서 아무 작업도 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 의 상태에

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing an XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>XPath 식을 나타내는.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"></xref> pointing to the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"> </xref> 선택된 된 노드 집합을 가리키는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression contains an error or its return type is not a node set.
trans-unit.target: XPath 식에 오류가 포함 되어 있거나 해당 반환 형식이 하지 노드 집합 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression is not valid.
trans-unit.target: XPath 식이 잘못 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: Selects a node set using the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 지정 된 설정 노드를 선택 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The context for the selection is the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> when you called this method.
trans-unit.target: 선택 영역에 대 한 컨텍스트는의 위치는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>이 메서드를 호출할 때.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: After you call this method, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> returned represents the set of selected nodes.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 호출 하 고 나면는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>반환 선택 된 노드 집합을 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> to iterate over the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>에 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>선택된 된 노드 집합을 반복 하.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following C# code iterates over the selected set of nodes.
trans-unit.target: 다음 C# 코드는 선택한 노드 집합을 반복합니다.

trans-unit.source: ``` XPathNodeIterator ni = nav.Select(expr); while (ni.MoveNext()) { Console.WriteLine(ni.Current.Name); } ``` The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: ``` XPathNodeIterator ni = nav.Select(expr); while (ni.MoveNext()) { Console.WriteLine(ni.Current.Name); } ```다음은 사용할 때 고려해 야 할 중요 참고 사항에서 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: - You can still use any of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object's navigation methods to move within the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 내에서 이동 하는 개체의 탐색 메서드</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 중 아무 메서드나 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> navigation methods are independent of the selected nodes in the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>탐색 메서드는 선택된 된 노드에 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> 무관</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - Future calls to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A> method return a new <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object that points to the selected set of nodes that matches the new <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: 시일에 대 한 호출이 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A>메서드 반환 새 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>새 일치 하는 선택한 노드 집합을 가리키는 개체 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A>호출.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: The two <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> objects are completely independent of each other.
trans-unit.target: 두 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>개체는 서로 완전히 독립적입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> requires namespace resolution, the prefix and namespace URI pair must be added to an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>, and the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A> method must be called to specify the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> to use for namespace resolution.
trans-unit.target: If는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>에 네임 스페이스 확인, 접두사 및 네임 스페이스 URI 쌍을 추가 해야 필요는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>, 및 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A>지정 하려면 메서드를 호출 해야는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>네임 스페이스 확인에 사용할.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose the document contains the following XML nodes.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, 다음 XML 노드를 포함 하는 문서입니다.

trans-unit.source: ``` <bookstore xmlns:bk='urn:samples'> <book bk:ISBN='1-325-0980'> <title>Pride And Prejudice</title> </book> </bookstore> ``` In this case, the following C# code selects the `bk:ISBN` node.
trans-unit.target: ``` <bookstore xmlns:bk='urn:samples'> <book bk:ISBN='1-325-0980'> <title>Pride And Prejudice</title> </book> </bookstore> ```다음 C# 코드 선택 하는 경우에 `bk:ISBN` 노드.

trans-unit.source: ``` XPathExpression expr = nav.Compile("book/@bk:ISBN"); XmlNamespaceManager mngr = new XmlNamespaceManager(new NameTable()); mngr.AddNamespace("bk","urn:samples"); expr.SetContext(mngr); XPathNodeIterator ni = nav.Select(expr); ``` > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> does not include a prefix, it is assumed that the namespace URI is the empty namespace.
trans-unit.target: ``` XPathExpression expr = nav.Compile("book/@bk:ISBN"); XmlNamespaceManager mngr = new XmlNamespaceManager(new NameTable()); mngr.AddNamespace("bk","urn:samples"); expr.SetContext(mngr); XPathNodeIterator ni = nav.Select(expr); ``` > [!NOTE]> If는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>는 접두사가 포함 되지 않은 네임 스페이스 URI는 빈 네임 스페이스 임을 가정 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>

trans-unit.source: If your XML includes a default namespace, you must still use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A> method and provide an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> that contains a prefix and namespace URI to handle the default namespace.
trans-unit.target: XML에 기본 네임 스페이스를 포함 하는 경우 반드시 사용 해야는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A>메서드를 제공 하 고는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>접두사 및 네임 스페이스가 기본 네임 스페이스를 포함 하는.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you have the following XML.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 다음 XML를 있다고 가정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ``` <bookstore xmlns="http://www.lucernepublishing.com"> <book> <title>Pride And Prejudice</title> </book> </bookstore> ``` In this case, the following C# code selects all book nodes: ``` XmlNamespaceManager nsmgr = new XmlNamespaceManager(nav.NameTable); nsmgr.AddNamespace("ab", "http://www.lucernepublishing.com"); XPathExpression expr; expr = nav.Compile("//ab:book"); expr.SetContext(nsmgr); XPathNodeIterator ni = nav.Select(expr); ``` This method has no effect on the state of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: ``` <bookstore xmlns="http://www.lucernepublishing.com"> <book> <title>Pride And Prejudice</title> </book> </bookstore> ```다음 C# 코드에서 모든 book 노드를 선택 하는 경우에: ``` XmlNamespaceManager nsmgr = new XmlNamespaceManager(nav.NameTable); nsmgr.AddNamespace("ab", "http://www.lucernepublishing.com"); XPathExpression expr; expr = nav.Compile("//ab:book"); expr.SetContext(nsmgr); XPathNodeIterator ni = nav.Select(expr); ``` 이 메서드는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 의 상태에 영향을 주지 않습니다

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref> object containing the compiled XPath query.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"> </xref> 컴파일된 XPath 쿼리를 포함 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"></xref> that points to the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"> </xref> 선택된 된 노드 집합을 가리키는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression contains an error or its return type is not a node set.
trans-unit.target: XPath 식에 오류가 포함 되어 있거나 해당 반환 형식이 하지 노드 집합 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression is not valid.
trans-unit.target: XPath 식이 잘못 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: Selects a node set using the specified XPath expression with the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object specified to resolve namespace prefixes.

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression is not valid.
trans-unit.target: XPath 식이 잘못 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: The SelectAncestors method has no effect on the state of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> of the ancestor nodes.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> object is created as the result of a schema validating <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object, the value specified to the SetTypedValue method is verified against the XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema for the XML document.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>스키마 유효성 검사의 결과로 개체가 만들어질 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>개체 SetTypedValue 메서드에 지정 된 값은 XML 문서에 대 한 XML 스키마 정의 언어 (XSD) 스키마에 대해 확인 됩니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: If the value specified is invalid according to the schema for the XML document, an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException> is thrown.

trans-unit.source: The SetTypedValue method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element or attribute node.
