trans-unit.source: |XPathNodeType|Property Value| |-------------------|--------------------| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.InnerText%2A> of the root node.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.InnerText%2A> of the element.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The value of the attribute.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The content of the text node.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The entire content excluding the target.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The content of the comment.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The white space between mark-up.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The white space between markup in a mixed content model, or white space within an `xml:space='preserve'` scope.|
trans-unit.target: | XPathNodeType | 속성 값 | |-------------------|--------------------| | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| 루트 노드의 <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.InnerText%2A>. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| 요소의 <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.InnerText%2A>. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| 특성의 값입니다. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| 텍스트 노드의 내용입니다. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| 대상을 제외한 전체 내용입니다. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| 주석의 내용입니다. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| 마크업 사이의 공백입니다. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| 내에서 공백 또는 혼합된 콘텐츠 모델에는 태그 사이의 공백은 `xml:space='preserve'` 범위입니다. |</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.InnerText%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.InnerText%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: Gets the current node as a boxed object of the most appropriate .NET Framework type.
trans-unit.target: 가장 적합 한.NET Framework 형식의 boxed 개체와 현재 노드를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: For attributes and elements with atomic simple type or simple text content, the TypedValue property returns a boxed <xref:System.Object> of the most appropriate .NET Framework <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: 원자성 단순 형식 또는 단순 텍스트 콘텐츠를 사용 하 여 요소 및 특성에는 boxed <xref:System.Object>가장 적합 한.NET Framework <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Object> TypedValue 속성 반환

trans-unit.source: If the element or attribute's content is a list type, the TypedValue property returns an array of objects of the most appropriate .NET Framework <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: TypedValue 속성 <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type> 가장 적합 한.NET framework 개체의 배열을 반환 요소 또는 특성의 콘텐츠가 목록 형식이 면

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the TypedValue returned by each <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 각 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> 반환한 TypedValue 설명

trans-unit.source: |XPathNodeType|TypedValue Returned| |-------------------|-------------------------| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|Returns a <xref:System.String> object containing all <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> node descendants of the document, concatenated and separated by white space.
trans-unit.target: | XPathNodeType | 반환 된 TypedValue | |-------------------|-------------------------| | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| 반환 된 <xref:System.String>모든 포함 된 개체 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>연결 되 고 공백으로 구분 된 문서의 노드 하위.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: If the document does not have any <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> node children, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is returned.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>
trans-unit.target: 문서 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>노드 자식을 포함 하지 않습니다, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>반환 됩니다. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: (typed or simple content)|Returns an <xref:System.Object> that represents the typed value of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.
trans-unit.target: (형식화 된 또는 단순 텍스트 내용을) | <xref:System.Object> <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> 형식화 된 값을 나타내는</xref:System.Object> 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> is defined as an XML Schema list data type, then the node value is exposed as an array of objects.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>노드 값은 개체의 배열으로 노출 하는 다음 XML 스키마 목록 데이터 형식으로 정의 됩니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Object> in the array contains the typed value of a child of the element.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>
trans-unit.target: 배열의 각 <xref:System.Object>요소의 자식의 형식화 된 값을 포함 합니다. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: (untyped, mixed, or complex content)|Returns a <xref:System.String> object containing all <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> node descendants of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> (including string representations of typed values), concatenated and separated by white space.
trans-unit.target: (형식화 되지 않은, 혼합 또는 복잡 한 콘텐츠) | 반환은 <xref:System.String>모든 포함 된 개체 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>의 하위 항목 노드는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>연결 되 고 공백으로 구분 된 (형식화 된 값의 문자열 표현을 포함).</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> does not have any <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> node children, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is returned.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>노드 자식을 포함 하지 않습니다, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>반환 됩니다. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: (typed or simple content)|Returns an <xref:System.Object> that represents the typed value of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.
trans-unit.target: (형식화 된 또는 단순 텍스트 내용을) | <xref:System.Object> <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> 형식화 된 값을 나타내는</xref:System.Object> 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> is boxed as a .NET Framework <xref:System.Type> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>.NET Framework로 boxed <xref:System.Type>값.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> is defined as an XML Schema list data type, the node value is exposed as an array of objects.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>정의 된 XML 스키마 목록 데이터 형식으로 노드 값은 개체의 배열으로 노출 됩니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Object> in the array contains the typed value of a child of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|A <xref:System.String> object containing the text.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|A <xref:System.String> object containing the content of the comments, excluding the surrounding `<!--` and `-->`.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|A <xref:System.String> object containing the content of the processing instruction, excluding the target and surrounding `<?` and `?>`.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|A <xref:System.String> object containing the namespace name.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|A <xref:System.String> object containing the text of the node.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|A <xref:System.String> object containing the text of the node.|
trans-unit.target: 배열의 각 <xref:System.Object>는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>의 자식의 형식화 된 값을 포함 합니다. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| 텍스트를 포함 하는 <xref:System.String>개체입니다. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| 주위를 제외한 주석의 콘텐츠를 포함 하는 <xref:System.String>개체 `<!--` 및 `-->`. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| <xref:System.String>개체 처리 명령의 콘텐츠 포함, 대상을 제외한 및 주변 `<?` 및 `?>`. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| 네임 스페이스 이름을 포함 하는 <xref:System.String>개체입니다. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| 노드의 텍스트를 포함 하는 <xref:System.String>개체입니다. | | <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>| A <xref:System.String>노드의 텍스트를 포함 하는 개체입니다. |</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The current node as a boxed object of the most appropriate .NET Framework type.
trans-unit.target: 가장 적합 한.NET Framework 형식의 boxed 개체와 현재 노드.

trans-unit.source: Used by <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> implementations which provide a "virtualized" XML view over a store, to provide access to underlying objects.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> 뷰를 원본 개체에 대 한 액세스를 제공 하는 저장소에 대 한 "가상된" XML을 제공 하는 구현 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The UnderlyingObject property can be used by <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> implementations which provide a "virtualized" XML view over a store, to provide access to underlying objects.
trans-unit.target: UnderlyingObject 속성에서 사용 될 수 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>뷰를 원본 개체에 대 한 액세스를 제공 하는 저장소에 대 한 "가상된" XML을 제공 하는 구현 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: For example, if an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object is used to provide a virtual XML view over a Common Language Runtime (CLR) object graph, you may wish to perform XPath queries using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A> method and then access the CLR objects underlying the selected nodes.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>사용 하 여 XPath 쿼리를 수행 하려고 할 수, 개체는 공용 언어 런타임 (CLR) 개체 그래프를 통해 가상 XML 뷰를 제공 하는 데 사용 되는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A>메서드 다음 선택된 된 노드에 CLR 개체에 액세스 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The UnderlyingObject property would expose these underlying objects.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 개체를 내부 UnderlyingObject 속성 노출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: In many cases, this value will be `null`, and the object returned by the UnderlyingObject property will always be implementation specific.
trans-unit.target: 대부분의 경우에서이 값은 됩니다 `null`, UnderlyingObject 속성에서 반환 된 개체는 항상 특정 구현 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The UnderlyingObject property should preserve object identity and should only be used to return objects that have a one-to-one correspondence to their respective overlaid items.
trans-unit.target: UnderlyingObject 속성 개체 id를 유지 해야 하 고 각 사항 겹치는 항목에 한 일 대응을 갖는 개체를 반환 하에 사용 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A user should always get the same object on successive visits to the same node using the same <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object or a cloned one.
trans-unit.target: 연속적으로 동일한를 사용 하 여 동일한 노드 사용자 동일한 개체를 항상 얻을 해야 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>개체 또는 복제 된 개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The UnderlyingObject property of an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object created by an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> object returns the corresponding <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >의 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>개체 <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>에 해당 <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> 반환 하는 개체에서</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> 만든</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> the UnderlyingObject 속성

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current node's value as the <xref:System.Type> specified, using the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object specified to resolve namespace prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 현재 노드의 값을 가져옵니다는 <xref:System.Type>사용 하 여 지정 된 <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>네임 스페이스 접두사를 확인 하기 위해 지정 된.</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAs%2A> method attempts to convert the value of the current node to the .NET Framework type, specified according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the current node's type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAs%2A>메서드는 현재 노드의 값을 현재 노드의 형식을 캐스팅할에 대 한 XPath 2.0 규칙에 따라 지정 된.NET Framework 형식으로 변환 하려고 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueAs%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object is used to resolve namespace prefixes related to type conversions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>개체 형식 변환에 관련 된 네임 스페이스 접두사를 확인 하는 데 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>

trans-unit.source: For example, when converting an `xs:QName` to an `xs:string`.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 변환 하는 경우는 `xs:QName` 에 `xs:string`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to return the current node's value as.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>반환할 현재 노드의 값 이름으로 저장</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object used to resolve namespace prefixes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>네임 스페이스 접두사를 확인 하는 데 사용 되는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>

trans-unit.source: The value of the current node as the <xref:System.Type> requested.
trans-unit.target: 현재 노드의 값은 <xref:System.Type>요청한.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The current node's value is not in the correct format for the target type.
trans-unit.target: 현재 노드의 값 형식이 대상 형식에 맞지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 시도 된 캐스팅이 잘못 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current node's value as a <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Boolean>.</xref:System.Boolean> 현재 노드의 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> has schema or type information (for example, from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> object initialized with an XML schema validating <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>), and if the current node is defined as an XML Schema `xs:boolean` type, the ValueAsBoolean property returns the current node's value as an unboxed <xref:System.Boolean> object.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>에 스키마 또는 형식 정보가 (예를 들어에서 <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>개체의 유효성 검사 XML 스키마로 초기화 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>), 현재 노드는 XML 스키마로 정의 되 고 `xs:boolean` 형식 ValueAsBoolean 속성을 unboxed 현재 노드의 값을 반환 합니다 <xref:System.Boolean>개체.</xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not have any schema or type information, the ValueAsBoolean property attempts to convert the string value of the current node to a <xref:System.Boolean> value, according to the XPath 2.0 casting rules for `xs:boolean`.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>스키마 또는 형식 정보를 속성에 현재 노드에서의 문자열 값으로 변환 하려고 ValueAsBoolean를 포함 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Boolean>값에 대 한 XPath 2.0 캐스팅 규칙에 따라 `xs:boolean`.</xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The current node's value as a <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 현재 노드의 값에 <xref:System.Boolean>.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: The current node's string value cannot be converted to a <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 현재 노드의 문자열 값에 <xref:System.Boolean>.</xref:System.Boolean> 변환할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The attempted cast to <xref:System.Boolean> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 시도 된 캐스트를 <xref:System.Boolean>올바르지 않습니다.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets the current node's value as a <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime> 현재 노드의 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current node's value as an <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32> 현재 노드의 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> has schema or type information (for example, from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> object initialized with an XML schema validating <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>), and if the current node is defined as an XML Schema `xs:integer` type, the ValueAsInt property returns the current node's value as an unboxed <xref:System.Int32> object.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>에 스키마 또는 형식 정보가 (예를 들어에서 <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>개체의 유효성 검사 XML 스키마로 초기화 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>), 현재 노드는 XML 스키마로 정의 되 고 `xs:integer` 형식 ValueAsInt 속성을 unboxed 현재 노드의 값을 반환 합니다 <xref:System.Int32>개체.</xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.target: 그러나 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>스키마 또는 형식 정보를 속성에 현재 노드에서의 문자열 값으로 변환 하려고 ValueAsInt를 포함 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Int32>값에 대 한 XPath 2.0 캐스팅 규칙에 따라 `xs:integer`.</xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int64>.</xref:System.Int64> 현재 노드의 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> has schema or type information (for example, from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> object initialized with an XML schema validating <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>), and if the current node is defined as an XML Schema `xs:integer` type, the ValueAsLong property returns the current node's value as an unboxed <xref:System.Int64> object.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>에 스키마 또는 형식 정보가 (예를 들어에서 <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>개체의 유효성 검사 XML 스키마로 초기화 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>), 현재 노드는 XML 스키마로 정의 되 고 `xs:integer` 형식 ValueAsLong 속성을 unboxed 현재 노드의 값을 반환 합니다 <xref:System.Int64>개체.</xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.target: 그러나 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>스키마 또는 형식 정보를 속성에 현재 노드에서의 문자열 값으로 변환 하려고 ValueAsLong를 포함 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Int64>값에 대 한 XPath 2.0 캐스팅 규칙에 따라 `xs:integer`.</xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Gets the .NET Framework <xref:System.Type> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 가져옵니다 <xref:System.Type>현재 노드의.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A> property gets the .NET Framework <xref:System.Type> of the typed value of the current node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A>속성에는.NET Framework 가져옵니다 <xref:System.Type>현재 노드의 형식화 된 값의.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A> of <xref:System.Int32> by default.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 형식의 요소 `xs:int` 갖기는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A>의 <xref:System.Int32>기본적으로.</xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A> could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int` such as <xref:System.Int16> or <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 그러나는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A>에 매핑될 수 있는 유효한 형식 중 하나가 될 수 `xs:int` 등 <xref:System.Int16> <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Int16> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathItem.ValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a node has no type, this is equivalent to the type annotation on the node being `xdt:untypedAtomic`.
trans-unit.target: 이 되는 노드가 형식이 없으면에 해당 하는 노드 형식이 없으면 `xdt:untypedAtomic`합니다.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the ValueType property returns a string for the node.
trans-unit.target: 이 경우 ValueType 속성 노드에 대 한 문자열을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [System.Xml 클래스의 형식 지원](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework <xref:System.Type> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework <xref:System.Type>현재 노드의.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Streams the current node and its child nodes to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object specified.
trans-unit.target: 현재 노드와 해당 자식 노드를 스트리밍하는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>지정 된 개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: Namespace declarations for the in-scope namespaces of the current node are inserted into the XML streamed to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object specified.
trans-unit.target: 현재 노드의 범위 내의 네임 스페이스에 대 한 Namespace 선언을에 스트리밍되는 XML에 삽입 되는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>지정 된 개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the WriteSubtree method is called on the first `book` element of the `books.xml` file, the `http://www.contoso.com/books` namespace declaration made at the top of the XML document will appear in the XML streamed to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object specified as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, WriteSubtree 메서드를 호출 하면 첫 번째 `book` 의 요소는 `books.xml` 파일을는 `http://www.contoso.com/books` XML 문서 맨 위에 있는 수행 하는 네임 스페이스 선언에 스트리밍되는 XML에 표시 됩니다는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>다음 예제와 같이 지정 된 개체.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: ``` <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <book genre="autobiography" publicationdate="1981" ISBN="1-861003-11-0" xmlns="http://www.contoso.com/books"> <title>The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin</title> <author> <first-name>Benjamin</first-name> <last-name>Franklin</last-name> </author> <price>8.99</price> </book> ``` > [!NOTE] > The WriteSubtree method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: ``` <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <book genre="autobiography" publicationdate="1981" ISBN="1-861003-11-0" xmlns="http://www.contoso.com/books"> <title>The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin</title> <author> <first-name>Benjamin</first-name> <last-name>Franklin</last-name> </author> <price>8.99</price> </book> ``` > [!NOTE]> WriteSubtree 메서드 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 의 위치에 영향을 주지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object to stream to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>개체를 스트림으로.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: Gets the `xml:lang` scope for the current node.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 `xml:lang` 현재 노드에 대 한 범위입니다.

trans-unit.source: In the example XML below, when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the `name` element, the XmlLang property returns a scope of `en-us` indicating that the node is in the scope of a `xml:lang="en-us"` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 다음 XML 예제에서 때는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>에 배치 되는 `name` 요소인 XmlLang 속성의 범위를 반환 `en-us` 의 범위에 있는 노드를 나타내는 `xml:lang="en-us"` 특성.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the value of the `xml:lang` scope, or <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> if the current node has no `xml:lang` scope value to return.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>의 값을 포함 하는 `xml:lang` 범위 또는 <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> 현재 노드가 없는 경우 `xml:lang` 반환할 값의 범위.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"></xref> information for the current node.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"> </xref> 현재 노드에 대 한 정보입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the XmlType property.
trans-unit.target: 다음은 XmlType 속성을 사용할 때 고려해 야 할 중요 한 참고 사항입니다.

trans-unit.source: - The XmlType property is `null`, unless the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is set to <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: -XmlType 속성은 `null`하지 않는 한, <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A> <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A> <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity?displayProperty=fullName> 로 설정 된</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 속성</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A> 의 속성</xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.Validity%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If this node is valid, the XmlType property is the same as the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.SchemaType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>, unless this node is a member of a union.
trans-unit.target: -XmlType 속성은와 동일이 노드의 유효한 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.SchemaType%2A>속성은 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A>속성의는 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>공용 구조체의 멤버가 아닌 경우,.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.SchemaType%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If this node is a member of a union, the XmlType property is the same as the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.MemberType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A> property of this <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -XmlType 속성이이 노드는 공용 구조체의 멤버인 경우 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.MemberType%2A> <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A> <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> 속성</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SchemaInfo%2A> 의 속성</xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo.MemberType%2A> 와 같습니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"></xref> object; default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"> </xref> 개체; 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.
